definitions.definition: A complicated or clandestine plot or scheme intended to effect some purpose by secret artifice ; conspiracy ; stratagem .
The plot of a play , poem or romance ; the series of complications in which a writer involves their imaginary characters .
Clandestine intercourse between persons; illicit intimacy ; a liaison or affair .

main_definition: A complicated or clandestine plot or scheme intended to effect some purpose by secret artifice ; conspiracy ; stratagem .
secondary_definitions: The plot of a play , poem or romance ; the series of complications in which a writer involves their imaginary characters .
Clandestine intercourse between persons; illicit intimacy ; a liaison or affair .
